it when the vehicle pulls away it sends

gives cities like Santa Monica the

the four million dollar system is aimed

dollar solar thermal plant being built
in the Mojave Desert the Ivanpah solar
field about an hour and a half outside
of Las Vegas is planned for completion
sometime next year when finished it will
have 350,000 mirrors spread over 3,600
acres of desert those mirrors reflect
sunlight onto boilers creating steam
which run turbines that should power
140,000 homes environmentalists say the
installation damages the natural habitat
of the endangered desert tortoise but
BrightSource one of the companies
building the site says it has spent 56
million dollars relocating the tortoises
Jamie Stillings photo essay appears in
